name: Groundless (itch)
description:
First game of ABCSDFWLO

None of jump, none of grab

Only pushing, using frictions

Quite difficult to control

The game is quite 'Groundless'

W,A,S,D to move horizontal

Space bar to descend

Mouse right click to change perspectives

Leave the ideas for the next levels

Blog : https://abcsdfwlo.blogspot.com/2020/04/groundless-v10.html
